thread.title: Here’s What Alia Bhatt Gifted Herself On Her 24th Birthday
thread.title_full: Here’s What Alia Bhatt Gifted Herself On Her 24th Birthday

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Here’s What Alia Bhatt Gifted Herself On Her 24th Birthday
text:
Sukriti Gumber Mar . 16 . 2017 Alia Bhatt for Harper’s Bazaar 8th Anniversary Issue 
Alia Bhatt turned 24 yesterday! Last year was a pretty successful one for Alia – Dear Zindagi , Kapoor & Sons , Udta Punjab were hits, and she also bought a beautiful new house , amidst doing other cool things. 
This year too, has started with a bang with Badrinath Ki Dulhania releasing just a week before her birthday and performing well all across. Surely Alia deserves a birthday gift, and what’s better than pampering yourself, right?! This year, Alia gifted herself a cat for her birthday: A post shared by Alia ✨⭐️ (@aliaabhatt) on Mar 15, 2017 at 6:36am PDT 
Alia is a cat lover and has another cat called Pikka. Enjoy your gift, Alia! 7
